preference.name: AppInterface_TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Used for configuring Teamcenter manufacturing process management technical portfolios. Defines the default relation used when a TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio dataset is pasted under an intermediate data capture (IDC) while creating technical portfolios. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a valid Teamcenter relation.
